name: student-scheduler-platform
description: A comprehensive platform for university students to find common free time slots with friends, manage timetables, and participate in campus activities

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd shared && npm install && cd ../services/api-gateway && npm install && cd ../user-service && npm install && cd ../timetable-service && npm install && cd ../friends-service && npm install && cd ../location-service && npm install && cd ../events-service && npm install && cd ../notification-service && npm install && cd ../../frontend && npm install
scripts.build:services: npm run build:shared && cd services/api-gateway && npm run build && cd ../user-service && npm run build && cd ../timetable-service && npm run build && cd ../friends-service && npm run build && cd ../location-service && npm run build && cd ../events-service && npm run build && cd ../notification-service && npm run build
scripts.build:all: npm run build:services && npm run build:frontend
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:user" "npm run dev:timetable" "npm run dev:friends" "npm run dev:location" "npm run dev:events" "npm run dev:notifications" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:gateway" "npm run start:user" "npm run start:timetable" "npm run start:friends" "npm run start:location" "npm run start:events" "npm run start:notifications"
scripts.test: cd services/api-gateway && npm test && cd ../user-service && npm test && cd ../timetable-service && npm test && cd ../friends-service && npm test && cd ../location-service && npm test && cd ../events-service && npm test && cd ../notification-service && npm test && cd ../../frontend && npm test
scripts.lint: cd services/api-gateway && npm run lint && cd ../user-service && npm run lint && cd ../timetable-service && npm run lint && cd ../friends-service && npm run lint && cd ../location-service && npm run lint && cd ../events-service && npm run lint && cd ../notification-service && npm run lint
scripts.clean: rm -rf services/*/dist services/*/node_modules frontend/node_modules frontend/build shared/dist shared/node_modules node_modules
